name: Ball Pass
description:
Explore over 60 bouncy levels filled with logic riddles,packed puzzles and plenty of fun challenges.
It's super addictive !-Try it out today!

Features:
● Over 60 Unique levels.
● Collect-ables in every level.
● Endless Excitement.
● Exciting Physics Elements.
● Addictive Sounds.
● Simple game-play for all ages.


How to Play:
- Drag your finger to move the Arrow in the direction of your aim .
- Lift your finger to shoot the ball in that direction .
- Figure out how to get the ball across the screen to the other end .
- Keep the ball from hitting the black blocks .
- Win all the levels by getting past the obstacles.

Play anytime and anywhere, it's totally addictive!
